columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the crawler.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the crawler.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: The name of the database in which the crawler's output is stored.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Indicates whether the crawler is running or pending.

columns.name: role
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that's used to access customer resources, such as Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) data.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time that the crawler was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the crawler.

columns.name: crawl_elapsed_time
columns.description: If the crawler is running, contains the total time elapsed since the last crawl began.

columns.name: crawler_lineage_settings
columns.description: Specifies whether data lineage is enabled for the crawler.

columns.name: crawler_security_configuration
columns.description: The name of the SecurityConfiguration structure to be used by this crawler.

columns.name: last_updated
columns.description: The time that the crawler was last updated.

columns.name: recrawl_behavior
columns.description: Specifies whether to crawl the entire dataset again or to crawl only folders that were added since the last crawler run. A value of CRAWL_EVERYTHING specifies crawling the entire dataset again. A value of CRAWL_NEW_FOLDERS_ONLY specifies crawling only folders that were added since the last crawler run. A value of CRAWL_EVENT_MODE specifies crawling only the changes identified by Amazon S3 events.

columns.name: table_prefix
columns.description: The prefix added to the names of tables that are created.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The version of the crawler.

columns.name: classifiers
columns.description: A list of UTF-8 strings that specify the custom classifiers that are associated with the crawler.

columns.name: configuration
columns.description: Crawler configuration information.

columns.name: last_crawl
columns.description: The status of the last crawl, and potentially error information if an error occurred.

columns.name: schedule
columns.description: For scheduled crawlers, the schedule when the crawler runs.

columns.name: schema_change_policy
columns.description: The policy that specifies update and delete behaviors for the crawler.

columns.name: targets
columns.description: A collection of targets to crawl.
